no_customers.description: Whenever the user asks for number of customers, buyers, or unique customers.
no_customers.calculation_guidelines: Use COUNT(distinct buyer_email) in order to get the proper number of customers.

basket_size.description: The average number of items per order.
basket_size.calculation_guidelines: - Use COUNT(asin) / COUNT(DISTINCT order_id) to calculate the average number of items per order

basket_value.description: Refers to the total amount of money a customer is expected to spend on a single shopping session
basket_value.calculation_guidelines: - Use SUM(gross_sales) / COUNT(DISTINCT order_id) to calculate the basket value
